subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The Local Governance and Economic Development Joint Programme (LGED-JP) is a programme of the Government of Sierra Leone that strengthens the strategic leadership in the decentralisation process and promote the ability of local governemnts to enhance pro-poor local economic development.
subproject.title: Local Governance & Decentraliz
